steps.title: Prepare Chicken
steps.instructions: Rinse the chicken wings with water and a little vinegar, then scrub them with lime to ensure they are clean of feathers or dirt.

steps.title: Season Chicken
steps.instructions: Season the chicken with Maggi seasoning, a bit of bouillon, ginger powder, black pepper, and rosemary.

steps.title: Add Fresh Herbs
steps.instructions: Add crushed garlic, sage, and thyme to the chicken.

steps.title: Marinate in Buttermilk
steps.instructions: Lightly cover the chicken with buttermilk, add a little hot sauce for flavor, and marinate overnight in the fridge.

steps.title: Prepare Candy Yams
steps.instructions: Peel and slice the sweet potatoes into half-inch rounds.

steps.title: Caramelize Sugar and Spices
steps.instructions: In a hot pan, melt the butter and brown sugar, then add cinnamon, grated fresh ginger, and nutmeg.

steps.title: Cook Candy Yams
steps.instructions: Stir in vanilla extract, add the sweet potatoes, cover, and simmer on low heat for 45 minutes.

steps.title: Prepare Macaroni Cheese Roux
steps.instructions: Melt butter in a pan, stir in flour to cook slightly, then gradually add evaporated milk.

steps.title: Add Cream and Cheese
steps.instructions: Add heavy cream and seasonings to the roux, then mix in cheddar cheese until melted.

steps.title: Combine with Macaroni
steps.instructions: Stir the cooked macaroni into the cheese sauce, then transfer to a baking dish.

steps.title: Bake Macaroni Cheese
steps.instructions: Top with more cheddar cheese and bake at 350 degrees Fahrenheit for 25 minutes.

steps.title: Prepare Fried Chicken
steps.instructions: Mix potato starch, flour, and seasonings in a container; coat marinated chicken in this mix.

steps.title: Fry Chicken
steps.instructions: Heat oil to 350 degrees Fahrenheit, then fry chicken until crispy, about 11 minutes for wings.

steps.title: Cook Green Beans
steps.instructions: Saute butter, garlic, onion, and seasonings, then add drained green beans and heat through.
